channel.title: portfolio on Catherine's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in portfolio on Catherine's Blog

item.title: Can Older Adults’ Acceptance toward Robots Enhanced by Observational Learning ?
item.description: Research Background Although older adults had higher negative attitudes toward robots than younger adults, their acceptance toward robots could be enhanced after direct interaction with robots (Chien et al, 2019).

item.title: i-Path : An Intelligent System for Preserving Older Adults’ Wisdom
item.description: Research Background Through the retrospective view on his or her life, the narrator can acquire resilience, wisdom, well-aging, and well-being (Pecorini & Duplaa, 2017 ).
